creator: Muddy Boots Software
descriptionHtml:
Greenlight Quality Control (GLQC) from Muddy Boots is an online platform that ensures all aspects of product quality are available in one centralised location for you and your stakeholders to easily access, update and share information instantly. This gives you complete visibility of the performance of your sites, suppliers and productions in real-time.

The QC app allows you to synchronise with an existing Greenlight Quality Control office web system to perform the following functions from any location in an offline state:

- Log new quality checks
- View product specifications
- Attach photo evidence
- Log corrective actions

The data is then sent back to GLQC Office, and alerts are triggered and sent to your stakeholders to action.

This app is only compatible for customers using Greenlight QC v110 or later.
descriptionShort: An online / offline platform that centralises all aspects of product quality.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Quality inspectors using the QC2 app can now view images in full screen by tapping on the image thumbnail in the Attachments tab.
Bug fixes and improvements

title: Greenlight Quality Control

creator: Muddy Boots Software
descriptionHtml:

descriptionShort: An online / offline platform that centralises all aspects of product quality.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The QC2 Application now supports overall constraints that have been set by question level. So it is now possible to configure Overall Constraints for Critical, Major, Minor, Standard and Sample question levels and for the QC2 app to update the overall QA Flag accordingly.

Bug fixes and improvements

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
QC2 app will now pre-select the users location when logging corrective actions. Also the app will update question scores that use % Sample Size correctly when the Sample changes.

In QC Mobile user data will now be synched down first.

Bug fixes and improvements
​​​

creator: Muddy Boots Software

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added an offline authentication option where the app cannot connect to the QC servers. This needs to be configured in Office before the app will allow authentication offline.

Added a GPS header type. When configured on an assessment, when a new check is started in the app for that assessment, the app will automatically capture the device's GPS coordinates and populate the header.

Bug fixes.

The data is then sent back to GLQC Office, and alerts are triggered and sent to your stakeholders to action.

This app is only compatible for customers using Greenlight QC v110 or later.
descriptionShort: An online / offline platform that centralises all aspects of product quality.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bugs fixes and performance improvements.

title: Greenlight Quality Control 2

creator: Muddy Boots Software
descriptionHtml:
Greenlight Quality Control (GLQC) from Muddy Boots is an online platform that ensures all aspects of product quality are available in one centralised location for you and your stakeholders to easily access, update and share information instantly. This gives you complete visibility of the performance of your sites, suppliers and productions in real-time.

The QC app allows you to synchronise with an existing Greenlight Quality Control office web system to perform the following functions from any location in an offline state:

- Log new quality checks
- View product specifications
- Attach photo evidence
- Log corrective actions

The data is then sent back to GLQC Office, and alerts are triggered and sent to your stakeholders to action.

This app is only compatible for customers using Greenlight QC v110 or later.
descriptionShort: An online / offline platform that centralises all aspects of product quality.
